p:
In the analysis, significantly negative correlations were observed with Rainfall
t−3 , Rainy days
t−2 , and Rainy days
t−3 in total mosquito count and Ae. albopictus mosquito count in Eriyawetiya study area together with Maximum RH
t−2 in Ae. aegypti mosquito count and Wind Speed
t−3 in total mosquito count. Further, significantly positive correlations were observed with Wind Speed
t−2 in both the Ae. aegypti and Ae. albopictus mosquito count.
